Header: Special device for kids to contact parents and police in emergency
Content: The Telecommunication and Digital Infrastructure Minister Harin Fernando said that a special communication device would be introduced in the near future to enable parents to locate their children while children would be able to contact parents and police in an emergency. Addressing a media conference held in Colombo this morning, the minister stated steps would be taken to introduce this special device after considering the series of tragic incidents in the recent past.
